title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Learning-Centered Leadership and Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational teacher professional learning (TPL) concepts and experience in mathematics instruction
context.additional_context: A mathematics job training course conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, aiming to develop teacher professionalism (TPL) through learning-centered leadership (LCL) and trust-based environment building

learning_goals: Explain three or more core strategies of Learning-Centered Leadership (LCL) and apply them to actual classroom situations
Propose two or more methods for sharing professional expertise with peer teachers in trust-based team collaboration environments
Apply and implement TPL strategies acquired through short-term intensive courses using mobile microlearning in mathematics classes at least once.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
